author: petervg
title: Landano: Cardano land registry Dapp
description: People in countries with inefficient and unreliable land registry systems cannot use the land they own as financial leverage.
solution: Landano registers land titles via a Dapp and a tokenized cadastre map. Transactions are made legally-binding by local legal professionals.
experience:
Wada and Empowa collaboration
Blockchain educator in Ghana
Dapp developers
Records managers
Graduate level researchers
